body.name: Sharp Carousel 1.4 Cu. Ft. 1100W Countertop Microwave Oven in Black Stainless Steel
body.stockDetail: Only 8 left in stock - order soon.
features: Prepare all of your favorite dishes with quick and even results or heat frozen food, coffee, soup and leftovers; Convenient 30 SEC-inch key for instant start; Express Cook for instant one-touch cooking up to 6 minutes; Auto defrost for quick and accurate thawing by weight; Time defrost and time cook for selected amount of time; Multi-stage cooking (up to 2 steps) and memory function; ; Family-sized 1.4 cu. ft. capacity microwave oven for countertop use; Convenient 30 SEC key for instant start

Bake a delicious, home-cooked meal in the single oven for you and your family without taking up much space; Black stainless finish with elegant grey interior and bright white LED light; Removable 12.4-inch glass Carousel turntable for even cooking; Height 12.40; Width 20.40; Depth 18.10; Weight 35.00; Color Black Stainless; Operating System; Batteries Included; Batteries Required; Number of Batteries 0; Battery Type Does Not Contain a Battery; Language English; Assembly Required
With impressive 1.40 ft? capacity, cook large meals without any problem
Touch control panel with blue LED display, clock, timer and child safety lock
1100 watts of power with 10 cooking power levels
body.description: As a complimentary appliance in a black stainless kitchen or a stunning design statement in any kitchen, Sharp's 1.4-cu. ft. black stainless microwave oven is an absolute show-stopper. The elegant grey interior complements the black stainless finish and features an energy efficient, bright white LED light. The roomy 1.4-cu. ft. capacity is ideal for cooking and reheating larger portions of food. Innovative features including Sensor Cook, Memory, Auto Defrost and the Carousel turntable system make preparing your favorite foods, snacks and beverages easier. With decades of experience designing smart innovative microwaves, its easy to see why home cooks throughout the world trust Sharp Carousel.

productInformation.value: #59,413 in Kitchen & Dining (See Top 100 in Kitchen & Dining) #72 in Countertop Microwave Ovens

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sharp is the greatest for microwaves.
reviews.reviewText: At first i thought i got a lemon because it kept cutting out but this one has to be installed directly into an outlet and you can not use a electrical strip for plug in. Moved it to a wall outlet and it works great. Sharp has excellent customer service and was about to replace it but they did not have to. No scratches, arrived early and boxed well. Was glad that Sharp still stands behind the products they sell and they last a long time. My last Sharp mircowave lasted twenty one years but they have gotten smaller in size..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All the features
reviews.reviewText: great microwave and even better at the price. Comes with all the presets I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well but.
reviews.reviewText: Feet of the unit have no gripping power. The lightness of the unit and feet that have no grip make it slide around on counter top when opening the door.I do not like the default button arrangement. Press 1 and you start the unit for one minute.How many items do you put in a smaller microwave that require minute increments of time?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Very Good Buy
reviews.reviewText: Our ancient microwave (over 10 years) was a Sharp and still worked, but was quickly becoming too small for us from our college days. So for Xmas we decided to buy another one. I wanted another Sharp as they're so reliable and was dismayed to see the prices. Kartit had this one priced very resonably so we purchased it and it works excellently.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Larger than I thought
reviews.reviewText: This microwave is much more sophisticated than the one I was replacing. It is heavier and larger than I thought. It will take some time to learn how to use it properly. There are some features I probably won't use at all. I am working with it and trying things out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: Will not buy from seller again
